title: The Riverhouse Stories: How Pubah S. Queen and Lazy LaRue Save the World
description: "It's a gift to the world, not quite a novel, not quite a collection of short stories....A precious moment in the channels of contemporary literature...very simply, a book of the heart."--San Francisco Chronicle"Her stories are carefully crafted magic....They joyously lull and illuminate."--Chicago Tribune
author: Andrea Carlisle
